means: 极度欢喜( rapture的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: They will be in raptures over the French countryside.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们会深深爱上法国的乡村。

sentence.Network_en: Davies goes into raptures over the brilliantly coloured paintwork.
sentence.Network_cn: 戴维斯深深喜欢上了那幅色彩绚丽的油画作品。

sentence.Network_en: His goal sent the crowd into raptures.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的进球使观众们欣喜若狂。

PerfectNetExp.abs: The mere thought of his bride moves Pinkerton to raptures ., 一想起新娘 , 平克顿不禁心花怒放.
We are in raptures over the new books ., 我们十分喜爱这些新书.
The critics went raptures about her performance ., 评论家们对她的表演赞口不绝.
perhaps you will give me leave to defer your raptures ., 那请允许我推迟您的狂喜吧.

list.abs: ...公义的审判，将所有信徒从地上搬走，从而完成所谓的“教会被提”（The rapture）　　但这仍旧没有发生。
canaliculus是... ... canaliculus breakage ： 断端 canaliculus rapture ： 泪小管断裂 canaliculus communicationis ： 交通小管.
BBC英语-Space Heroes 太空英雄_在线英语听力室 ... catching up 迎头赶上 rapturous applause 热烈的掌声 tuned in 收看.
pedicled greater omentum displacement for treatment of esophageal rapture ., 带蒂大网膜移植治疗食管破裂.

entry.def: If you are in raptures or go into raptures about something, you are extremely impressed by it and enthusiastic about it.

example.ex: They will be in raptures over the French countryside...
example.tran: 他们会深深爱上法国的乡村。

example.ex: Davies goes into raptures over the brilliantly coloured paintwork...
example.tran: 戴维斯深深喜欢上了那幅色彩绚丽的油画作品。

auth_sentence.content: Would its raptures have struck him as pretty pictures?
auth_sentence.res_content: Would its raptures have struck him as pretty pictures?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Would its raptures have struck him as pretty pictures?

auth_sentence.content: But Henson drilled over a long-range effort from near the right touchline to send the Welsh fans into raptures.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Henson drilled over a long-range effort from near the right touchline to send the Welsh fans into raptures.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Henson drilled over a long-range effort from near the right touchline to send the Welsh fans into raptures.

auth_sentence.content: The scoreboard proclaims Trott the Olympic champion and the crowd, including Prince Harry, goes into raptures once again.
auth_sentence.res_content: The scoreboard proclaims Trott the Olympic champion and the crowd, including Prince Harry, goes into raptures once again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The scoreboard proclaims Trott the Olympic champion and the crowd, including Prince Harry, goes into raptures once again.
